pull.title: [logs] Fix a few log messages related to duration measurement
pull.body:
- Remove fixed-width formatting for the duration value (`%15d` -> `%d`), for better consistency with other [similar](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/search?q=dms&unscoped_q=dms) logging statements.
- Correct the logging statement that starts with a space (`" block index %15dms\n"`) to start with a verb. 
- Add `" in "` between the operation description and the millisecond duration.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14711](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14711.html) (Remove uses of chainActive and mapBlockIndex in wallet code by ryanofsky)
* [#13582](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/13582.html) (Extract AppInitLoadBlockIndex from AppInitMain by Empact)
* [#10973](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/10973.html) (Refactor: separate wallet from node by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Note: Travis and AppVeyor fail due to seemingly unrelated issues:
https://ci.appveyor.com/project/DrahtBot/bitcoin/build/master.1848?fullLog=true
https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/435323308
Not sure what this is fixing. ~~NACK.~~

Updated the PR's description to contain more information about the issues it fixes.
Should I split it into separate commits?
Also, I'm not sure how to test it (other than manually running `bitcoind` and inspecting the logs)...

How about this one:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/1e8f88e071019907785b260477bd359bef6f9a8f/src/validation.cpp#L2312

This only benefits the human eye as the durations can be extracted either way. Consistency is a plus though.

Retracted from NACK to -0.

Good suggestion!
Will update the PR in the following days.

I have updated (most) the benchmarking-related code in this PR to be consistent with the format used at [src/validation.cpp](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/1e8f88e071019907785b260477bd359bef6f9a8f/src/validation.cpp#L2312), except the code at [src/wallet/wallet.cpp](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14358/files#diff-b2bb174788c7409b671c46ccc86034bd) (since it uses [CWallet::WalletLogPrintf()](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/7990bb5b61cb343e47a0333dfc0dd9f0cd4ae5a8/src/wallet/wallet.h#L1123)).
Updated the PR to use the original logging categories.

events.message:
[logs] Fix a few log messages related to duration measurement

Also, remove fixed-width formatting for the duration value ('%15d' -> '%d')

events.body: @promag Please let me know if there is a problem with this PR.

comments.body: @romanz I didn't meant to change the log category. I think some of these messages must/should be present in the log regardless of the enabled logging categories.

Sounds good, I'll switch back to using `LogPrintf()`.

Just a small question: are the new log messages fine? 
If not, please let me know so I would fix them :)
